name: Ratatat Turtle
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse: Move
  • Click: Shoot
  • Ctrl+F: Fullscreen

How to play:

  • Shoot rubbish to destroy it and don't get hit by any yourself
  • Get the powerup to get piercing shots for a limited time

Sound Credits:

  • Music - https://freesound.org/people/tyops/sounds/423805/
  • Game over - https://freesound.org/people/Euphrosyyn/sounds/442127/
  • Shooting - https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862/
  • Powerup - https://freesound.org/people/jalastram/sounds/317769/ 
  • Boss battle - https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/sounds/367504/

Thanks for playing :D

Play some of the other games from the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/seajam/entries

TeamSeas: https://teamseas.org/
